pullrequest.title: Compute sha256 for generated tarballs and pass to jenkins jobs

content.raw:
Running the script on my local machine from `/tmp` just created a pull request!

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/59/files

~~~
export PACKAGE_ALIAS=gazebo6
export SOURCE_TARBALL_URI=http://gazebosim.org/distributions/gazebo/releases/gazebo-6.5.1.tar.bz2
export VERSION=6.5.1
bash ${RELEASE-TOOLS}/jenkins-scripts/lib/homebrew_formula_pullrequest.bash
~~~
